rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，尽管经过超加工，植物性肉类仍可能促进心脏健康研究表明，与动物肉相比，植物性肉类替代品 (PBMA) 可能具有心脏保护作用，但将其归类为超加工食品需要进一步的长期研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Plant-based-meats-may-boost-heart-health-despite-being-ultra-processed-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Plant-based-meats-may-boost-heart-health-despite-being-ultra-processed-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=148ccfdd-c3ca-4033-b718-9ca131a9769a Sun, 30 Jun 2024 20:38:00 -0400 Plant-based meats may boost heart health despite being ultra-processed, study finds
生活方式和空气污染模式如何影响死亡率研究发现，不健康的生活方式选择和较高的空气污染水平都会显着增加全因死亡的风险，强调需要采取协调的健康和环境干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/How-lifestyle-and-air-pollution-patterns-affect-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/How-lifestyle-and-air-pollution-patterns-affect-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=269bc373-d858-474d-a3a9-0e4cd6653624 Sun, 30 Jun 2024 20:18:00 -0400 How lifestyle and air pollution patterns affect mortality
每周吃三次小胡萝卜可提高年轻人皮肤中的类胡萝卜素水平一项新的研究发现，每周只吃三次小胡萝卜零食，就能显着增加年轻人皮肤中的类胡萝卜素含量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Eating-baby-carrots-third-times-a-week-raises-skin-carotenoid-levels-in-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Eating-baby-carrots-third-times-a-week-raises-skin-carotenoid-levels-in-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e40dff24-872a-4042-8d84-4cb3189048dc Sun, 30 Jun 2024 19:55:09 -0400 Eating baby carrots three times a week raises skin carotenoid levels in young adults
研究发现，以婴儿为主导的断奶可为婴儿生长提供充足的热量新的研究结果表明，以婴儿为主导的断奶——；向婴儿引入固体食物的一种流行方法 -；为生长和发育提供充足的热量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Baby-led-weaning-provides-adequate-calories-for-infant-growth-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Baby-led-weaning-provides-adequate-calories-for-infant-growth-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff86593b-c921-42d5-b896-3a5d922324b9 Sun, 30 Jun 2024 19:52:17 -0400 Baby-led weaning provides adequate calories for infant growth, study finds
地中海饮食和 DASH 饮食有助于降低 1 型糖尿病成人患者患心血管疾病的风险一项为期六年的研究结果显示，与地中海饮食或预防高血压的饮食方法 (DASH) 饮食相一致的饮食模式可能有助于降低 1 型糖尿病成人患心血管疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Research-Uncovers-Heart-Protective-Eating-Patterns-For-Type-1-Diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Research-Uncovers-Heart-Protective-Eating-Patterns-For-Type-1-Diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7725015-cd03-488e-b57e-612407a07642 Sun, 30 Jun 2024 19:47:00 -0400 Mediterranean and DASH diets could help lower cardiovascular disease risk in adults with type 1 diabetes
较高的超加工食品摄入量与老年人死亡风险增加有关在一项新的研究中，根据 NOVA 分类系统的定义，报告食用较多超加工食品的老年人在中位随访 23 年中，与食用较少加工食品的老年人相比，死亡可能性高出约 10%食物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Higher-ultra-processed-food-intake-linked-to-increased-mortality-risk-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Higher-ultra-processed-food-intake-linked-to-increased-mortality-risk-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c706f3d6-caee-4a07-9f0b-d7a89a0492a7 Sun, 30 Jun 2024 19:45:02 -0400 Higher ultra-processed food intake linked to increased mortality risk in older adults
研究表明，主要吃最低限度加工的食品并不利于健康饮食一项新的研究表明，主要食用 NOVA 分类系统所定义的最低限度加工食品并不会自动形成健康饮食，这表明我们所吃的食物类型可能比用于制作它们的加工水平更重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Eating-primarily-minimally-processed-foods-does-not-make-for-a-healthy-diet-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Eating-primarily-minimally-processed-foods-does-not-make-for-a-healthy-diet-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1fd415cf-2efb-481c-bbe7-be26136fa572 Sun, 30 Jun 2024 19:43:23 -0400 Eating primarily minimally processed foods does not make for a healthy diet, study shows
研究揭示了医疗补助放松后的覆盖差距和医疗服务挑战在对阿肯色州、肯塔基州、路易斯安那州和德克萨斯州低收入成年人的一项调查中，自 2020 年 3 月以来的某个时间点加入医疗补助的受访者中，八分之一的受访者表示，到 2023 年底，他们将不再享受医疗补助，其中近一半的人报告称不再享受医疗补助根据哈佛大学陈曾熙公共卫生学院的一项研究，目前没有保险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240629/Study-reveals-coverage-gaps-and-health-access-challenges-post-Medicaid-unwinding.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240629/Study-reveals-coverage-gaps-and-health-access-challenges-post-Medicaid-unwinding.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3078e09a-ebf0-4d9d-8928-efc655f0929c Sat, 29 Jun 2024 21:38:16 -0400 Study reveals coverage gaps and health access challenges post-Medicaid unwinding
孕前摄入钙和锌可降低妊娠期高血压疾病的风险最新研究表明，与那些必需矿物质摄入量较低的人相比，在怀孕前三个月内钙和锌摄入量较高的人在怀孕期间患高血压疾病的可能性显着降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240629/Preconception-intake-of-calcium-and-zinc-linked-to-lower-risk-of-hypertential-disorders-of-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240629/Preconception-intake-of-calcium-and-zinc-linked-to-lower-risk-of-hypertential-disorders-of-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43d69f4e-05d2-4004-bf59-1a7f4520f5e1 Sat, 29 Jun 2024 21:32:04 -0400 Preconception intake of calcium and zinc linked to lower risk of hypertensive disorders of pregnancy
橄榄中发现的天然化合物可以降低血糖水平并促进减肥一项新的小鼠研究结果表明，橄榄中发现的天然化合物烯醇酸可以降低血糖水平并促进减肥。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240629/Natural-compound-found-in-olives-can-lower-blood-sugar-levels-and-promote-weight-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240629/Natural-compound-found-in-olives-can-lower-blood-sugar-levels-and-promote-weight-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2d55d2f-b9dc-43ad-9714-35e1f0ab5ea3 Sat, 29 Jun 2024 21:26:59 -0400 Natural compound found in olives can lower blood sugar levels and promote weight loss
